                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <tr>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <td><em><em>This is the last of six blogs written by Alan Stern exclusively for SkyandTelescope.com. The previous ones are:<br />                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | </em></em></p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <ul>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <li><a href="http://www.skyandtelescope.com/astronomy-news/new-horizons-navigating-to-pluto-040320154//" target="_blank">New Horizons: Navigating to Pluto</a></li>         |                     |            |                                                                                                                |         |                     |            |                                                                                                                |         |                     |            |                                                                                                                |         |                     |            |                                                                                                                |         |                     |            |                                                                                                                |         |                     |            |                                                                                                                |         |                     |            |                                                                                                                |         |                     |            |                                                                                                                |         |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p>The post <a rel="nofollow" href="http://www.skyandtelescope.com/astronomy-news/top-10-surprises-from-the-pluto-flyby/">&#8220;Top 10&#8243; Surprises from the Pluto Flyby</a> appeared first on <a rel="nofollow" href="http://www.skyandtelescope.com">Sky &amp; Telescope</a>.</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 +

 204328 | 2015-10-28 04:00:00 | Technology | Predicting the human genome using evolution                                                                    | http://www.eurekalert.org/pub_releases/2015-10/mbae-pth102815.php                                                                                      |                   | 2015-10-29 15:38:21.155099 |                                                                                                                                                    | (<i>Molecular Biology and Evolution (Oxford University Press)</i>) By observing evolution's 'greatest hits' (and misses) and the history of the major themes and patterns of genome conservation (and divergence) across many species, Temple University professor Sudhir Kumar's approach predicts probable mutations that will be found among people and the fate of human variation.
 204560 | 2015-10-29 16:55:25 | Astronomy  | Q Continuum Project: Reveals "How Gravity Acts on Dark Matter of the Universe"                                 | http://www.dailygalaxy.com/my_weblog/2015/10/q-continuum-project-reveals-how-gravity-acts-on-dark-matter-of-the-universe.html                          | dailygalaxy.com   | 2015-11-22 20:00:48.302988 |                                                                                                                                                    | <div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p> </p>\r                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p> </p>\r                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p><a class="asset-img-link" href="http://www.dailygalaxy.com/.a/6a00d8341bf7f753ef01b7c7e4b2b1970b-pi" style="display: inline;"><img alt="102242_web" border="0" class="asset  asset-image at-xid-6a00d8341bf7f753ef01b7c7e4b2b1970b image-full img-responsive" src="http://www.dailygalaxy.com/.a/6a00d8341bf7f753ef01b7c7e4b2b1970b-800wi" title="102242_web"></img></a></p>\r                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p> </p>\r                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p>Researchers are sifting through an avalanche of data produced by one of the largest cosmological simulations ever performed, run on the <a class="zem_slink" href="http://www.olcf.ornl.gov/titan/" rel="homepage" target="_blank" title="Titan (supercomputer)">Titan supercomputer</a> at DOE's Oak Ridge National Laboratory. The project modeled the evolution of the universe from just 50 million years just 50 million years after the Big Bang to the present day -- from its earliest infancy to its current adulthood. Over the course of 13.8 billion years, the matter in the universe clumped together to form galaxies, stars and planets; but we're not sure precisely how.</p>\r                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | These kinds of simulations help scientists understand dark energy, a form of energy that affects the expansion rate of the universe, including the distribution of galaxies, composed of ordinary matter, as well as dark matter that no instrument has directly measured so far.\r                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p>Intensive sky surveys with powerful telescopes, like the <a class="zem_slink" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sloan_Digital_Sky_Survey" rel="wikipedia" target="_blank" title="Sloan Digital Sky Survey">Sloan Digital Sky Survey</a> and the new, more detailed <a class="zem_slink" href="http://www.darkenergysurvey.org/" rel="homepage" target="_blank" title="The Dark Energy Survey">Dark Energy Survey</a>, show scientists where galaxies and stars were when their light was first emitted. And surveys of the <a class="zem_slink" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cosmic_microwave_background_radiation" rel="wikipedia" target="_blank" title="Cosmic microwave background radiation">Cosmic Microwave Background</a>, light remaining from when the universe was only 300,000 years old, show us how the universe began -- "very uniform, with matter clumping together over time," said Katrin Heitmann, an Argonne physicist who led the simulation.</p>\r                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p>The simulation fills in the temporal gap to show how the universe might have evolved in between: "Gravity acts on the dark matter, which begins to clump more and more, and in the clumps, galaxies form," said Heitmann.</p>\r                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p>Called the <a class="zem_slink" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Q_Continuum" rel="wikipedia" target="_blank" title="Q Continuum">Q Continuum</a>, the simulation involved half a trillion particles -- dividing the universe up into cubes with sides 100,000 kilometers long. This makes it one of the largest cosmology simulations at such high resolution. It ran using more than 90 percent of the supercomputer. For perspective, typically less than one percent of jobs use 90 percent of the Mira supercomputer at Argonne, said officials at the Argonne Leadership Computing Facility, a DOE Office of Science User Facility . Staff at both the Argonne and Oak Ridge computing facilities helped adapt the code for its run on Titan.</p>\r                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p>"This is a very rich simulation," Heitmann said. "We can use this data to look at why galaxies clump this way, as well as the fundamental physics of structure formation itself."</p>\r                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p>Analysis has already begun on the two and a half petabytes of data that were generated, and will continue for several years, she said. Scientists can pull information on such astrophysical phenomena as strong lensing, weak lensing shear, cluster lensing and galaxy-galaxy lensing.</p>\r                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p>The code to run the simulation is called Hardware/Hybrid Accelerated Cosmology Code (HACC), which was first written in 2008, around the time scientific supercomputers broke the petaflop barrier (a quadrillion operations per second). HACC is designed with an inherent flexibility that enables it to run on supercomputers with different architectures.</p>\r                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p>Details of the work are included in the study, "The Q continuum simulation: harnessing the power of GPU accelerated supercomputers," published in August in the <a class="zem_slink" href="http://iopscience.org/apj" rel="homepage" target="_blank" title="The Astrophysical Journal">Astrophysical Journal Supplement Series</a> by the <a class="zem_slink" href="http://aas.org/" rel="homepage" target="_blank" title="American Astronomical Society">American Astronomical Society</a>.</p>\r                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p>The image at the top of the page shows a substructure within a halo in the Q Continuum simulation, with "subhalos" marked in different colors.</p>\r                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p>Image credit: DOE/Argonne National Laboratory</p>\r         |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <fieldset class="zemanta-related"><legend class="zemanta-related-title">Related         |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <div class="zemanta-article-ul-li-image zemanta-article-ul-li" style="padding: 0;         |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <div class="zemanta-article-ul-li-image zemanta-article-ul-li" style="padding: 0;         |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <div class="zemanta-article-ul-li-image zemanta-article-ul-li" style="padding: 0;  204596 | 2015-10-29 20:55:59 | Science    | Large Hadron Collider luminosity upgrade project moving to next phase                                          | http://phys.org/news/2015-10-large-hadron-collider-luminosity-phase.html                                                                               |                   | 2015-11-22 20:20:13.672884 | general physics                                                                                                                                    | This week more than 230 scientists and engineers from around the world met at CERN to discuss the High-Luminosity LHC – a major upgrade to the Large Hadron Collider (LHC) that will increase the accelerator's discovery potential from 2025.
 205852 | 2015-02-26 17:36:03 | Linux      | 5 Basic Principles of Linux System Security                                                                    | http://linux-audit.com/5-basic-principles-of-linux-system-security/                                                                                    | Michael Boelen    | 2015-11-12 14:14:20.902795 | hardening,secure,basics,principles,security                                                                                                        | <h1>5 Basic Principles of Linux System Security</h1>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p>It is still common that people do not know where to start when it comes to information security. With 5 basic principles we can improve the Linux system security and question ourselves if we have done enough.</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p>&nbsp;</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <h2><span style="color: #3366ff;">1. Know your system(s)</span></h2>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p>The first principle is about knowing what your system is supposed to do. What is its primary role, what software packages does it need and who needs access?</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p>By knowing the role of the system you can better defend it against known and unknown threats.</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p>&nbsp;</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <h3>Security Measures:</h3>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <p>&nbsp;</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <ul>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <li>Password policy</li>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <li>Proper software patch management</li>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <li>Configuration management</li>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | <li>Documentation</li>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   +
        |                     |            |                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                        |                   |                            |                                                                                                                                                    | </ul>
